answers.answer: I'm due July 4th. It has been very hard but I am staying positive!!
I'm due July 8!! Its been a tough pregnancy but it will be worth it when I hold my baby!
Im due july 22 have diabetes but under control but thank god my baby is perfectly fine. When will you guys go to find out what you are having?
July 17! I'm having a handsome little prince:)
I found out the gender of my baby at 12 weeks:) Subsequently, the ultrasound confirmed it at 13 weeks. Good luck ladies:)

July 18th.  Its been rough as I was diagnosed with hyperemesis Gravidvarium,  or super morning sickness as I call it. I have had to have iv fluids once so far, and am now on 2 different meds for nausea and vomitting
July 12th. And its been rough and I've cried a lot but I look at my sonogram pictures and just know its all worth it because I get to meet my little munchkin
I'm due july 26th. I'm very excited can't wait. ***** to be diagnosed with diabetes but its under control. Can't wait for baby!

question: I would love to hear your experience so far ive had a rocky road but love every minute of it!!
title: Any Ladies Due July??
